summary.span: 用作 控件的根类。

span.span: Serves as the root class of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开图表 Web 控件的所有属性、方法和事件。This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Web control. 类的两个重要属性是和属性, 两者都是集合属性。Two important properties of the class are the and properties, both of which are collection properties. 集合属性存储对象, 这些对象用于存储要显示的数据, 以及这些数据的属性。 The collection property stores objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data. 集合属性存储对象, 这些对象主要用于使用一组轴绘制一个或多个图表。 The collection property stores objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.

summary.span: 使用升序排序顺序排列图表中的指定系列。

span.span: The specified series in the chart are aligned using an ascending sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于使用轴标签沿 X 轴排列不同序列中的数据点, 适用于以下情况:This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - 显示多个序列并编制索引;也就是说, 所有数据点均为 0, 或者属性为`true`。Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an of 0, or the property is `true`. - 所有数据点的轴标签都是唯一的, 它们都是唯一的。All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their . 如果它们不是唯一的, 则将引发异常。If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown. 当数据绑定导致创建多个序列并且`string`值用于 X 轴值时, 这种情况很常见。This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values. 绘制多个索引序列并使用`string`值设置 X 值时, 会出现两个问题:Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - 无法保证不同序列中具有相同字符串 X 值的数据点将在沿 X 轴的同一索引处绘制。It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis. - 将仅显示第一个序列中数据点的轴标签, 即使来自具有相同索引的其他序列的数据点也具有轴标签也是如此。Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too. 默认情况下, 点按其在序列中的存储顺序进行绘制。By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series. 若要指定排序顺序, 请使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` `sortingOrder`包含参数的方法重载。To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定绘制文本和图形时是否使用抗锯齿功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消除锯齿功能通过使用中间颜色填充像素来使得 "交错边缘", 对于不作为矩形绘制的图表, 尤其适用于对边缘进行平滑处理。Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles. 例如, 抗锯齿功能对于折线图和饼图非常有效, 但不适用于条形图和柱形图。For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts. 抗锯齿功能可以应用于文本和/或图形基元, 如矩形、圆形等。Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth. 请注意, 抗锯齿会影响性能。Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在运行时自动分配了颜色, 则没有办法知道呈现图表之前的颜色, 此时将返回自动分配的值的 "属性" `Color` 。When the colors are automatically assigned at run time, there is no way to know what the colors will be prior to the time when the chart rendered; the `Color` property of an automatically assigned value will return at this time. 如果调用方法, 将设置序列和数据点的颜色, 这允许以编程方式进行访问。If you call the method, the colors for the series and the data points will be set, which allows for programmatic access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB (alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色) 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 请注意, 对于对象, alpha 组件不能设置为255以外的值。Note that for the object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255. 这也意味着仅对于对象 , 不能使用值。This also means that, for the object only, a value cannot be used. 如果使用背景的渐变颜色, 则该值将为第一种使用的颜色。The value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制颜色的不透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为 "透明"-也就是说, 如果使用的 alpha 值为 0, 则不会将颜色分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent" - that is, if you use an alpha value of 0 - no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此, 背景将是透明的。As a result, the background will be transparent. 下表表示支持渐变的类型:The following table represents the types that support gradients: |序列类型Series Types|二维2D|3D3D| |------------------|--------|--------| |条形图Bar|XX|-| |盒须图Box Plot|XX|XX| |气泡图Bubble|-|-| |蜡烛棒Candle Stick|XX|XX| |列Column|XX|XX| |圆环图Doughnut|XX|-| |误差条形图Error Bar|-|-| |Fast LineFast Line|-|-| |快速点Fast Point|-|-| |漏斗图Funnel|XX|XX| |—Gantt|XX|-| |卡吉Kagi|-|-| |线Line|-|-| |饼图Pie|XX|-| |点Point|-|-| |点数图Point and Figure|XX|-| |极坐标图Polar|-|-| |棱锥图Pyramid|XX|XX| |雷达图Radar|XX|XX| |范围列Range Column|XX|-| |砖形图Renko|XX|-| |样条Spline|-|-| |样条面积区Spline Area Area|XX|-| |样条范围Spline Range|XX|-| |堆积面积图Stacked Area|XX|-| |堆积区域100Stacked Area 100|XX|-| |堆积条形图Stacked Bar|XX|-| |堆积条形图100Stacked Bar 100|XX|-| |堆积柱形图Stacked Column|XX|-| |堆积柱形图100Stacked Column 100|XX|-| |步骤行Step Line|-|-| |股价图Stock|-|-| |新三值图Three Line Break|XX|-|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图像的显示方式, 例如, 平铺、缩放等。This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像, 则该图像将拉伸以适合图表边界内。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart. 如果图像已平铺, 则从图表左上角开始, 重复绘制图像。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息, 请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果将属性设置为, 则绘制图像的位置由属性设置确定。 If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Customize As EventHandler

summary.span: 恰好在绘制图表图像之前发生。

span.span: Occurs just before the chart image is drawn.

summary.span: 所有图表数据都可用并且已设置所有图表属性。

span.span: All chart data is available and all chart properties have been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件有两个独特的功能:This event has two unique features: - 所有图表数据都可用;也就是说, 将填充序列及其数据点。All chart data is available; that is, the series and their data points are populated. 如果正在使用数据绑定, 此方法特别有用, 因为可以检查数据, 并且可以在绘制之前对图表进行调整。This is especially useful if data-binding is being used, because the data can be examined and the chart can be adjusted just prior to being drawn. - 已设置所有图表属性, 包括已设置为 "自动" 的属性。All chart properties have been set, including those properties that have been set to "Auto". 换句话说, "Auto" 属性现在存储自动计算的值, 并可在绘制图表之前检查和修改。In other words, "Auto" properties now store the automatically calculated values, and can be examined and modified prior to the chart being drawn. 例如, 类的和属性。 Examples are the and properties of the class. 使用此事件可在绘制图表图像之前修改或自定义该图像。Use this event to modify or customize the chart image before it is drawn. 对图表区域进行更改 (如轴刻度) 时, 必须重新计算图表区属性才能正确呈现图表。When changes are made to a chart area, such as to the axis scale, the chart area properties must be recalculated in order to render the chart correctly. 若要重新计算图表, 请在进行修改后调用方法。To recalculate the chart, call the method after making modifications.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CustomizeLegend As EventHandler(Of CustomizeLegendEventArgs)

summary.span: 恰好在绘制图表图例之前发生。

span.span: Occurs just before the chart legend is drawn.

summary.span: 可使用此事件自定义图表图例项。

span.span: Use this event to customize the chart legend items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件主要用于自定义图例, 就在绘制之前。The event is primarily used to customize the legend just before it is drawn. 默认和自定义图例项都可以删除或修改, 还可以添加自定义项。Both default and custom legend items can be removed or modified, and custom items can also be added. 此外, 还可以更改图例项的顺序。In addition, the order of legend items can be changed. 还可以在使用发送方参数绘制图表图像之前修改该图像。The chart image can also be modified before being drawn by using the sender argument. 请注意, 默认图例项是为数据序列或数据点创建的项, 但自定义图例项不会以任何方式与图表数据连接。Note that a default legend item is an item that is created for either a data series or data point, but a custom legend item is not connected in any way to the chart data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CustomizeMapAreas As EventHandler(Of CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs)

summary.span: 恰好在呈现图像映射之前发生。

span.span: Occurs just before the chart image map is rendered.

summary.span: 可使用此事件自定义映射区项。

span.span: Use this event to customize the map areas items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的属性可用于:The property of the class can be used to: - 删除或修改已为图表对象自动创建的地图项;具有非空`Url` `MapAreaAttributes`或`ToolTip`属性的任何数据点、序列、图例项或条带线对象都具有关联的映射区对象。Delete or modify map items that have automatically been created for a chart object; any data point, series, legend item or strip line object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object. - 添加具有用户定义的形状和坐标的自定义地图区域。Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates. > [!NOTE] > 类型的发送方自变量是只读的。The sender argument of type is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列将自动添加到图表中, 具体取决于数据源的给定`seriesGroupByField`列中的唯一值的数目; 换言之, 系列的创建取决于对列进行分组的方式。Series will be automatically added to the chart, depending on the number of unique values in the given `seriesGroupByField` column of the data source; in other words, the creation of series depends upon grouping of a column. 数据源可以是, 也可以是对象。The data source can be a , or a object. 请注意, 可以使用实现接口的所有集合。Note that all collections that implement the interface can be used. 除 X 和 Y 值之外的其他数据点属性可以绑定。Other data point properties besides X and Y-values can be bound. 格式为:PointProperty = Field [{Format}] [, PointProperty = Field [{Format}]]。The format is: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty= Field[{Format}]]. 例如: "Tooltip = Price {C1}, Href = WebSiteName"。For example:"Tooltip=Price{C1},Href=WebSiteName". 这些数据点属性包括:These data point properties include: - - - - - - - - , 它是自定义属性的名称。, which are the names of the custom properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以确定位于指定点处的图表元素 (如果有)。Call this method to determine the chart element, if any, that is located at a specified point. 此方法通常用在一些与鼠标相关的事件中-例如, 通过使用来确定最终用户单击的图表元素。This method is often used in some mouse-related event - for example, MouseDown - to determine which chart element the end-user clicked. 然后, 将使用从事件参数获取的 X 和 Y 鼠标坐标作为`x`此方法调用的和`y`参数值。The X and Y mouse coordinates obtained from the event parameters are then used for the `x` and `y` parameter values of this method call. 然后, 可以使用返回对象的属性来确定所单击的图表元素 ; 对象还提供选定的实际对象的实例 (如果有)。The properties of the returned object can then be used to determine which chart element was clicked; the object also provides an instance of the actual object selected, if any.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if is set to . 使用 image 标记方法呈现图表图像时, 将生成图表图像, 然后将其保存到服务器上的磁盘, 格式由属性确定。When you render a chart image using the image tag method, a chart image is generated and then saved to disk at the server, in a format that is determined by the property. 保存图像文件的 URL 可以是绝对的, 也可以是相对的;映像文件的文件扩展名由属性确定。The URL where the image file is saved can be either absolute or relative; the file extension that the image file has is determined by the property. 映像文件可以硬编码为始终为一个文件名, 也可以使用 "#" 符号来使用用户标识符 (Uid) 或指定数量的唯一命名文件 (称为轮循机制)。The image file can be hard-coded to always be one filename, or you can use the "#" sign to use either user identifiers (UIDs) or a specified number of uniquely named files, which is known as a Round Robin.

span.span: Loads a template into the control from an image stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要从流加载模板 (如内存流、文件流等), 请使用此方法。Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth. 请确保在通过 方法保存模板`true`之前将属性设置为。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板具有两个数据序列, 则序列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表中。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换句话说, 第一个模板系列外观属性将分配给图表的第一系列, 第二个模板系列外观属性将应用于第二个序列的图表, 然后第三个模板系列将再次使用第一个模板系列序列图等。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 这同样适用于图表区域和具有外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

param.span: 必须指定要从磁盘加载的模板的完整路径。

span.span: Loads a template with the specified filename from the disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`参数必须使用完整路径, 例如 C:\MyPic.jpg。The `name` parameter must use a full path, for example, C:\MyPic.jpg. 请注意, 还必须指定文件扩展名。Note that you must also specify the file extension. 此方法从使用方法保存的磁盘加载模板。This method loads a template from disk that was saved using the method. 请确保在通过 方法保存模板`true`之前将属性设置为。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板具有两个数据序列, 则序列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表中。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换句话说, 第一个模板系列外观属性将分配给图表的第一系列, 第二个模板系列外观属性将应用于第二个序列的图表, 然后第三个模板系列将再次使用第一个模板系列序列图等。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 这同样适用于图表区域和具有外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的调色板。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下两个条件, 则使用调色板自动将颜色分配给数据元素:A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - 数据点本身不会分配颜色。the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them. - 数据点所属的数据序列也没有分配的颜色。the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果未显式指定序列或数据点颜色, 则所使用的颜色将取决于图表类型和对象的调色板, 或者如果指定了一个, 则为关联序列的调色板。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果和`Palette` 对象的属性设置为, 并且未将任何颜色分配给相关的数据序列或数据点, 则将不绘制数据点, 并且这些数据点将显示为 "空" 区域。 If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to , and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn, and will be displayed as "empty" areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要的颜色超过16种, 或者需要将自己的颜色应用于图表, 则必须定义自定义调色板。If you need more than 16 colors or you want to apply your own colors to the chart, you must define a custom palette. 使用自定义调色板可以按您希望在图表中显示的顺序来添加您自己的颜色。A custom palette let you add your own colors in the order you want them to appear on the chart. 如果图表中的序列数在设计时是未知的, 则此类型的调色板特别有用。This type of palette is especially helpful if the number of series in your chart is unknown at design time. 当属性*未*设置为时, 此属性不起作用。This property has no effect when the property is *not* set to .

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示图表图像的呈现方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the rendering method used to display a chart image.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，表示用于显示图表图像的呈现方法。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the rendering method used to display a chart image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的列表介绍了可用于呈现图表图像的三种方式:The following list describes the three ways in which a chart image can be rendered: - 呈现类型会导致临时文件保存在服务器的磁盘上。The render type causes a temporary file to be saved to disk at the server. 图表在客户端使用\ 标记显示, 其 SRC 特性设置为属性所指定的 URL。The chart is displayed at the client side using an \ tag, with its SRC attribute set to the URL specified by the property. - 如果指定了呈现类型, 则在服务器上没有临时图像文件。If the render type is specified, there are no temporary image files at the server. 相反, 图表图像将作为二进制流发送, 并使用\ 标记显示, 其 SRC 属性设置为另一个负责生成图表图像的 .aspx 页面。Instead, the chart image is sent as a binary stream, and is displayed using an \ tag with its SRC attribute set to another .aspx page that is responsible for generating the chart image. - 的呈现类型会导致创建图像映射, 但不会导致显示实际的图表图像。A render type of causes an image map to be created, but does not result in the display of an actual chart image. 仅当使用呈现类型为的图像映射时, 才应执行此选项。This option should only be taken when using an image map that has a render type of . 请注意, 可以使用属性来控制如何将临时图像文件保存到磁盘。Note that you can control how temporary image files are saved to disk using the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为`true`, 则将禁止显示非严重异常。If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed. 如果控件无法使用所提供的数据和其他设置正确绘制图表, 则会引发异常。When the control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown. 尽管在应用程序测试期间显示异常非常有用, 但在发布应用程序时不应显示异常。Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released. > [!NOTE] > 将此属性设置`true`为可能会隐藏用户应用程序源代码中的严重问题。Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code. 此设置还可能会导致生成可能会误报你的数据的图表图像。This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data. 强烈建议仅在发布版本中使用此模式。It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可设置控件的视图状态。Use this property to set the view state of the control. 设置此属性时, 视图状态由控件自动保存, 并且在发生回发时也会自动加载。When you set this property, the view state is automatically saved by the control, and is also loaded automatically when a postback occurs. 为了获得更大的灵活性 , 请将属性用于用户定义的视图状态。For greater flexibility, use the property for user-defined view state. 若要启用状态管理, 请将属性`true`设置为。To enable state management, set the property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你指定要在客户端上保留的数据时, 此属性与属性相比具有更大的灵活性。When you specify data to persist at the client, this property provides greater flexibility compared with the property. 当执行用户定义的视图状态时, 它由开发人员设置视图状态, 并在发生回发时使用视图状态。When the user-defined view state is implemented, it is up to the developer to set the view state, and to utilize the view state when a postback occurs. 还`Save`可以`Load`选择使用对象的和方法来设置视图状态, 还可以在发生回发时加载视图状态。The `Save` and `Load` methods of the object can optionally be used to set the view state, as well as to load the view state when a postback occurs. 有关此示例, 请参阅下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this. 为简单起见, 当指定要保存的图表状态时, 请使用属性, 该属性可以设置为 "数据"、"视觉外观" 属性或两者。For simplicity, when you specify the chart state to be saved, use the property, which can be set to data, visual appearance properties or both. 若要启用状态管理, 请将属性`true`设置为。To enable state management, set the property to `true`.
